quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us
author: Helen Keller

quote: When you lose a couple of times, it makes you realize how difficult it is to win
author: Steffi Graf

quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame
author: Erica Jong

quote: You move totally away from reality when you believe that there is a legitimate reason to suffer
author: Byron Katie

quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use
author: Ruth Gordon

quote: Always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that’s the one that is going to require the most from you
author: Caroline Myss

quote: Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be
author: Sheila Murray Bethel

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Woman must not accept; she must challenge.She must not be awed by that which has been built up around her; she must reverence that woman in her which struggles for expression
author: Margaret Sanger

quote: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman. But the search to find that voice can be remarkably difficult
author: Melinda Gates

quote: A man’s got to do what a man’s got to do. A woman must do what he can’t
author: Rhonda Hansome

quote: You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: When we do the best we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another
author: Helen Keller

quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away
author: Maya Angelou
